workflow.meta: This workflow is applicable only for Datapark DP11000 Software Components

action.name: On Hold
action.view: Datapark Software Components - On Hold Screen

action.name: Assign to QA
action.meta: QA Team Leader assigns Issue to QA

action.name: Cannot Fix
action.view: Datapark Software Components - Cannot Fix Issue Screen

action.name: Unassign QA
action.meta: QA Team Leader unassigns current QA Member

action.name: Resume Dev.
action.view: Datapark Software Components - Plan Development Screen

action.name: Resume QA
action.view: Datapark Software Components - Plan QA Screen
